cz.tzima.partialsshot.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.tzima.partialsshot.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.jnativehook.keyboard.NativeKeyListener, org.jnativehook.mouse.NativeMouseListener, org.jnativehook.mouse.NativeMouseMotionListener

    public final class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jnativehook.keyboard.NativeKeyListener, org.jnativehook.mouse.NativeMouseListener, org.jnativehook.mouse.NativeMouseMotionListener
    Decides which actions should be executed based on user's keyboard or mouse input.
    Author:
    Tomas Zima

      Controller()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void nativeKeyPressed(org.jnativehook.keyboard.NativeKeyEvent e)
      Called each time a key is pressed (at system level) by jNativeHook.
      void nativeKeyReleased(org.jnativehook.keyboard.NativeKeyEvent e)
      Called each time a key is released (at system level) by jNativeHook.
      void nativeKeyTyped(org.jnativehook.keyboard.NativeKeyEvent e)
      Called each time a key is pressed and released by jNativeHook.
      void nativeMouseClicked(org.jnativehook.mouse.NativeMouseEvent e)
      Called each time a mouse button is pressed and released by jNativeHook.
      void nativeMouseDragged(org.jnativehook.mouse.NativeMouseEvent e)
      Called each time a mouse moved from one location to another with mouse button pressed by jNativeHook.
      void nativeMouseMoved(org.jnativehook.mouse.NativeMouseEvent e)
      Called each time a mouse moved (at system level) by jNativeHook.

      Called each time a mouse button is pressed by jNativeHook.

      Called each time mouse button is released by jNativeHook.
      void register()
      Hooks up keyboard and mouse listeners.

      void setOnStatusChangeListener(OnStateChangeListener onStatusChangeListener)
      Sets a listener which is triggered each time application's state is changed.
      void setRequestedPointsCount(int count)
      Sets count of points which are requested for determining the shape of the screenshot.

      • nativeMouseMoved

        public void nativeMouseMoved(org.jnativehook.mouse.NativeMouseEvent e)
        Called each time a mouse moved (at system level) by jNativeHook. This is used for remembering where the mouse where last time (in the case point is selected using keyboard). It's unfortunately impossible to get mouse coordinates directly.
        Specified by:
        nativeMouseMoved in interface org.jnativehook.mouse.NativeMouseMotionListener
        Parameters:
        e - Event.

      • setRequestedPointsCount

        public void setRequestedPointsCount(int count)
        Sets count of points which are requested for determining the shape of the screenshot.
        Parameters:
        count - Count of points.
